entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
